dcterms:creator: Christian Lessmeier
James Kuria Kimotho
Detmar Zimmer
Walter Sextro
dcterms:description: An extensive dataset containing vibration recordings of healthy and outer ring damaged bearings, resulting from experiments with undamaged bearings and those with artificially damaged outer rings, as well as genuine outer ring faults created via accelerated lifetime tests. The dataset includes variable operating conditions with different rotation speeds.
dcterms:title: Paderborn Dataset
